comments.body: Hello,be aware of Scammers. Here I have proof, thathttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1097731.0and https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405664.0by username: PrivateSystemsis a scammer. I have the full Telegram chat and I can proof you, that this is his telegram (https://t.me/bulletproofrdp also in his post in topic 5405664.0). Due to sensitive informations, I sent this Video to LoyceV.Here you will find all Screenshots.The Product:https://simp5.jpg.church/Screenshot-2023-01-06-at-08-39-17-Manage-Product.png(deleted because of privacy)Paid Invoice:https://simp5.jpg.church/Screenshot-2023-01-07-at-13-39-42-My-Invoices.pngAccount Deleted:https://simp5.jpg.church/Screenshot-2023-01-10-at-08-16-44-Choose-Account.pngHere he blocked me on Telegram: https://simp5.jpg.church/monkey_blocked_me.pngIn case the user changes his telegram on his site or this topic: https://web.archive.org/web/20230110082628/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405664.0https://web.archive.org/web/20220611115455/https://t.me/bulletproofrdpand here I opened a Ticket to ask for the Password of the Server, as it was active, but I dont have the Screenshot of the ticket, only the Email.Here is the Screenshot: https://simp5.jpg.church/ticket_email.pngThis is link from the email: https://www.best-rdp.com/billing/viewticket.php?tid=059620&c=IzXk1AEw
